Package com.att.ads.sample

This package contains an activity (Ad View, Settings, Response) tabs and configuration an application context for global access parameters in sample.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
OnLocationInitialized This interface define the GPS location change & time Expire for Lat/Long.
 

Class Summary
AdsApplication This class is used to maintain Global application state and it is implemented as a Singleton context.
AdsEncryptDecrypt AES algorithm is the “Advanced Encryption Standard.” to encrypt, decrypt, generate a message authentication code
AdsMainActivity Main activity of the Sample SDK.
AdsViewActivity Displays Ad View based on selected category and settings.
GPSListener This class for the GPS enabling and disabling .
ResponseActivity This UI Activity which displays the Ad response in JSON format.
SettingsViewActivity The UI activity which is used to configure Settings.
 

Package com.att.ads.sample Description

This package contains an activity (Ad View, Settings, Response) tabs and configuration an application context for global access parameters in sample. First copy adsapi.jar file into your project lib Directory then add into the project class path. Create ATTAdView object and set the appkey , secret key and Category.Finally add your view object to adFrameLayout.
